 2001-14722001-08-280,  HRD,  ,  , 
PrecisReappointment of NICOLE LANGLAIS, of Les Coteaux, Quebec, as Chairperson of the Boards of Referees for the Quebec Regional Division, and particularly for the District of Vandreuil-Dorion, for a term of three years, effective October 27, 2001.
